summary.description:
Purva Silversky is a luxury residential development in Hebbagodi, Electronic City, offering thoughtfully designed 3 and 4 Bed apartments for those who value space, calm, and contemporary living. Envisioned by Hafeez Contractor and spread across 6.99 acres, the development is planned to complement the rhythm of modern life, allowing work and home to coexist with ease.

With just 356 exclusive apartments, Purva Silversky reflects the advantage of low-density living in Bengaluru?s technology corridor. Landscaped green spaces, wellness-inspired amenities, and elegant architectural detailing create an address that feels open, composed, and quietly restorative.

Here, balance is experienced through everyday living in unhurried moments, generous spaces, and time that feels naturally your own. Here, balance isn?t an idea. It?s a way of living.
highlights: Luxury 3 & 4 BHK apartments in Electronic City
Ideal for IT professionals & long-term investors

aboutBuilder.name: Puravankara

meta.title: About the Developer
meta.subtitle: A trusted name with a proven track record in delivering quality homes
meta.tagline: Built on credibility. Known for consistency.

aboutBuilder.description: Puravankara Limited, headquartered in Bengaluru, is one of India?s most admired and trusted home builders and is recognized among the top real estate companies in India, with a legacy of excellence spanning over 50 years. Founded in 1975, the company is known for delivering high-quality homes on time with complete transparency.
aboutBuilder.descriptionExpanded: Puravankara has launched three prominent brands, each catering to distinct market segments. Puravankara itself is recognized for its luxurious, state-of-the-art projects that incorporate innovative technology to redefine future homes. Provident Housing Ltd., a wholly-owned subsidiary launched in 2008, addresses the needs of mid-income homeowners. Purva Land, established in 2021, offers a lucrative investment opportunity through plotted developments, responding to the evolving needs of homebuyers. Additionally, Starworth Infrastructure and Construction Limited (SICL) provides technology-enabled construction solutions. Puravankara also has a strong presence in commercial office spaces.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.subtitle: Everything you need to know before making a decision

faqs.title: Where is Purva Silversky located?
items: Purva Silversky is located in Hebbagodi, Electronic City, Bengaluru, a well-established IT corridor with direct access to major tech parks, NICE Road, and Hosur Road.

faqs.title: What type of homes are available at Purva Silversky?
items: The project offers spacious 3 & 4 BHK luxury apartments, designed for families and professionals who value larger living spaces, privacy, and low-density living.

faqs.title: How large is the project and how many homes are there?
items: Purva Silversky is spread across 6.99 acres and features 356 exclusive homes, ensuring a low-density, premium residential environment.

faqs.title: How many towers and floors does the project have?
items: The development comprises 3 residential towers with G+32 floors, thoughtfully planned to maintain openness, views, and privacy.

faqs.title: What makes Purva Silversky different from other projects in Electronic City?
items:
Key differentiators include:
88% open-to-sky living
Low-density planning (only 356 homes)
Wellness-focused design with forest trails, yoga decks, and calm outdoor spaces
Architectural design by Hafeez Contractor

faqs.title: Who is the developer of Purva Silversky?
items: Purva Silversky is developed by Puravankara Limited, a trusted real estate brand with 50+ years of legacy and a strong presence in India?s premium housing segment.

faqs.title: Is Purva Silversky suitable for IT professionals working in Electronic City?
items:
Yes. The project is ideal for IT professionals due to:
Short commute to Electronic City Phase 1 & 2
Large homes suitable for work-from-home setups
Calm, wellness-oriented living after long work hours

faqs.title: What amenities are available at Purva Silversky?
items:
Residents enjoy a 17,700 sq. ft. clubhouse along with:
Wellness zones & yoga decks
Forest bathing trails
Shaded canopy walkways
Culinary gardens & curated social spaces
Fitness, leisure, and community amenities

faqs.title: Is Purva Silversky a good option for long-term investment?
items:
Yes. Strong fundamentals include:
Prime Electronic City location
Low supply of large 3 & 4 BHK luxury homes
Backing of a reputed developer
High rental demand from senior IT professionals and leadership roles

faqs.title: Does Purva Silversky offer good rental potential?
items:
Yes. Larger homes in gated communities near Electronic City attract:
Senior IT professionals
CXOs and expat tenants
Families seeking long-term rentals
This supports stable rental yields and lower vacancy risk

faqs.title: Is the project RERA approved?
items: Yes. Purva Silversky is RERA registered, ensuring transparency, legal compliance, and buyer protection. (RERA: PRM/KA/RERA/1251/310/PR/151225/008338)

faqs.title: Are these homes suitable for end users or investors?
items:
Both:
End users benefit from space, calm living, and wellness design
Investors benefit from location strength, brand credibility, and limited inventory

faqs.title: How does Purva Silversky compare with other Purva projects?
items: Purva Silversky is positioned as a low-density, wellness-focused luxury enclave, unlike larger township-style developments ? making it more exclusive and lifestyle-driven.

faqs.title: How can I schedule a site visit or get detailed pricing?
items:
You can:
Request a guided site visit
Get latest pricing, availability, and payment plans
Receive unbiased assistance from PropYouLike
